__e: When your opponent is the mountain, you must be the sea.
If your opponent is an equal, you must be sure to make the first move.
Yup, because your opponent is our own...
But if you do lose, you're supposed to just turn to whoever you played, and you say, "good job."
$100 limit, no trash-talking your opponent, and I don't want to hear about this ever again.
Unfortunately, Mr Dowland, as Miss Lane is your opponent, and since she is a sister in arms, so to speak, your request is not something...
